alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 02 at 9:24AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Mississippi, including the following county, Jackson. * WHEN...Until 1045 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 924 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms has exited the area, with lingering ponding/flooding possible from recent heavy rain. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ocean Springs, Moss Point, Escatawpa, St. Martin, Gautier, Hickory Hills, Vancleave, Helena, Gulf Park Estates, Gulf Hills and Latimer. - This includes the follwing Interstate... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 48 and 76. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
